title: feat: add BYOP and API Key Usage Grafana dashboards
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Adds new Grafana dashboards to track 'Bring Your Own Pollen' usage and analyze API key consumption patterns.
gist.impact: Provides the team with better visibility into app profitability and how credits are consumed across shared keys.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee analyzing a retro computer monitor with colorful 8-bit graphs and charts. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'METRICS'. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
